attributes.title: Too dumb
attributes.review: Pity poor Republicans. They have only one argument left to defend President Donald Trump for abusing the powers of the presidency by inviting a foreign power to intervene in an American election, the one transgression our Founding Fathers feared most. Even now that he’s covered in disgrace as only the third president in our history to be impeached, it’s all they’ve got left.

attributes.title: Scary
attributes.review: Okay so the first thing I see when I open this app is an very orange orangutang I love orangutangs but this orangutang looks sick and unhappy they also seem to be yelling about something and it’s honestly horrifying I really hope that someone gets that poor animal some medical help they look like they need it

attributes.title: boogie man
attributes.review: i opened this app to share my views on the great upcoming election in where trump is trying to win or something. i open the app to see a fat cheeto with a fake cheesy smile on it. i was so scared that i threw away the cheetos i was eating. they then proceeded to say how this orange is great. i am aware that this must be a virus so i will proceed to leave 1 star(the best) so that this will not get fixed and this app will hopefully get shut down. this app is quite the horror show and i am sure if i had opened it my phone would of exploded like aluminum foil in a microwave .

attributes.title: Pain
attributes.review: This app caused me pain and I cried after downloading the app. This app shouldn’t be abusive and hurtful like this, this app also gives out false information. I would very much like to have this app removed from the App Store from giving me this much stress, anxiety, depression, suicidal thoughts, hurtful thoughts and more.

attributes.title: 1 star
attributes.review: If I could I would give this app 0 stars, but I can’t. I downloaded the app to see why this is #1 on news but when I opened it, I saw inappropriate pictures of Mr Donald J Trump and little kids, then I gave him the benefit of doubt and kept tapping and saw pictures of him naked with his wig off and getting a spray tan. ZERO OUT OF TEN

attributes.title: HORRIFYING AND DISGUSTING!!!
attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately was bombarded with pictures of a gross orange 🤢🤮 and I couldn’t exit the app! Like I do not want a rotting wrinkly orange forever on my phone so I had to turn my phone off, but when I opened up my phone I had pictures in my gallery OF THE ORANGE 😡🤮🤢🤬🤯!!!!111!!1!!1!1!!!! Never downloading this app again!

attributes.title: Waist of space ✋😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I support Big Cheeto Man and his campaign, to find a picture of Big Cheeto Man getting a tan with his tiny tic tac. 👁👄👁Thinking nothing of it, I scrolled through my phone pictures. WHAT DO I SEE? A picture of Big Cheeto Man AGAIN in my photos. I then realized this app brings nothing but misfortune. DO NOT GET IT!!!! 😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: When I went to open the app the only thing I saw was a black screen. Because I am a Trump supporter I was made very uneasy by the dark color. I may have left a better review if it was at least a white screen. Please get your team to fix this issue, Thanks!

attributes.title: hospital
attributes.review: i wish i could give this a 0 ! first of all, black lives matter. SECOND OF ALL, i opened the app and i’m horrified. donald trump was in front of it and he scared me so i hit my head on the wall and had to go to the hospital, i got 30 stitches AND surgery 😡 I CANT BELEIVE THIS. sometimes i don wanna be happy. don’t hold it against me 🥖 😭😌💅🏼 . luv y’all byeee

attributes.title: No no no
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and the first thing I saw was a big Cheeto 😳 that’s is not okay I feel like it’s offensive and it is not appropriate to any one that will download this app, I also think that this app would probably hack your phone or something but I do not recommend this
